description.@en: The dead shall walk these streets, with none the wiser of their true origin . . .

effect.@en: After successfully casting, a number of allies or objects equal to 3+[WB] have their scent completely masked. This includes the rotting smell of death.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, and the allies’ or objects’ movement is rendered completely silent.

criticalFailure.@en: The scent of death becomes immediately unbearable, as you and everyone else around the allies or objects you touch suffer [[/roll 2D10+2]] Peril every minute.
